content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity Generator at Position (X)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at position (X1)
- Boiler at position (Y1)
- Offshore pump at position (Z1)

### Copper Plate Mine at Position (X2)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (X2-1) and a furnace at position (Y2-1)
- Burner mining drill at position (X2-2) and a furnace at position (Y2-2)
- Burner mining drill at position (X2-3) and a furnace at position (Y2-3)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill at position (X3-1) and a furnace at position (Y3-1)
- Assembling machine at position (Z3-1) and inserter at position (A1) that puts into the assembling machine
- Belt group at position (B1) that connects the furnace at position (Y3-1) to the assembling machine at position (Z3-1)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Using Extracting but Being Too Far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when Placing into a Tile Which is Occupied by Another Entity
- Ensure you can place an entity on a tile before attempting placement.
